title: Textile, 1750–75
medium: Silk taffeta with embroidery in silk and metal  thread.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Design of curving stems with several different kinds of flowers and leaves; worked in couching, French knots, laid and satin stitches.  Colors: pinks, blues, green, and much gold on brown ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1750–75.
1750–75. Silk taffeta with embroidery in silk and metal  thread.. Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection. 1943-46-17.
